name: Icarus Isolation - LD 38
description:
Discover the small worlds of Icarus Isolation and discover its secrets.

This project is a proof of concept created for the Ludum Dare 38 game jam.

CONTROLS:

WASD to move

E to initiate free fall

Spacebar to ascend

Up and down arrows to rotate in the air

P to pause and exit

For a better tutorial watch here

*Play version 1.2 if you want to play the game, Play version 1.0 if you want to judge for LD38*

Version 1.2 contains:

- camera bug fixes

- raycast bug fixes

- item bug fixes

- mouse control options

- rings are added for easier adjustment to the controls
